text: On July 27, 2022, an earthquake hit the island of Luzon in the Philippines. It had a magnitude of 7.0 , with an epicenter in Abra province. Ten people were reported dead and 320 were injured. At least 12,802 homes, schools and other buildings were damaged or destroyed. ==References== Category:July 2022 events Category:2022 earthquakes Category:2022 disasters in Asia Category:2022 in the Philippines Category:Luzon Category:Abra (province)
title: 2022 Luzon earthquake
